content: Who is this so splendidly robed,
I will recount the gracious deeds of the ,
because of all that the  has done for us,
that he has shown them according to his mercy,
For he said, “Surely they are my people,
It was no messenger or angel
in his love and in his pity he redeemed them;
Look down from heaven and see,
Where are your zeal and your might?
Why, O , do you make us stray from your ways
Turn back for the sake of your servants,
Your holy people took possession for a little while;
We have long been like those whom you do not rule,
